name: fixintel-ai
description: AI-powered repair guide app with step-by-step instructions, tutorial videos, and local repair shop recommendations

scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && eas build --profile production --platform all
scripts.build:frontend:ios: cd frontend && eas build --profile production --platform ios
scripts.build:frontend:android: cd frontend && eas build --profile production --platform android
scripts.build:preview: cd frontend && eas build --profile preview --platform all
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete
scripts.health-check: npm run health-check:backend && npm run health-check:frontend
scripts.update:frontend: cd frontend && eas update --branch production --message 'OTA update'

author: FixIntel AI
